posts.post_title: FS: T206 HOF lot of two - $130
posts.post_content:
Selling as a single lot, three SGC graded cards.  Price includes insured delivery. Paypal is preferred

Jake Beckley - SGC 30 - $70
George Davis - SGC 30 - $70
Ike Rockenfeld - SGC 20 - SOLD
